title: Verify owner of account to protect it.
body:
Hi. This is my idea how you can protect your account.
This does not have to be necessary. In case someone steals your account, you just prove your identity to Riot employee and if your identity matches with account he will provide you a password reset.

replies.body: Account security is important and we have a guide that provides some tips on [protecting your account](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account).  Players who do have issues [recovering their account](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) can reach out to us by[ submitting a ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)to player support.  Thanks for the suggestion!
If your account is compromised (or you just forget the info etc.) that is exactly what you do already, through a support ticket.
